content.text:
# Draft:1938–39 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

----
The 1938-39 Queens Park Rangers season was the club's 48th season of existence and their 19th season in the Football League Third Division. QPR finished 6th in the league, and were eliminated in the third round of the FA Cup.
Season summary
A new roof over the new Loftus Road Terracing was unveiled on 29th October.
QPR reached the semi-final of the Third Division Cup, but the match was abandoned following the outbreak of World War II.
League standings
Results
QPR scores given first
